mapper.insert: insert into pms_category (name, parent_id, depth, keywords, sort, icon, enable, is_parent, is_display, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{name}, #{parentId}, #{depth}, #{keywords}, #{sort}, #{icon}, #{enable}, #{isParent}, #{isDisplay}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: select id from pms_category where name=#{name};
